      • taskStopped

        private void taskStopped(java.lang.Throwable t,
                         java.lang.String taskType,
                         int status)
        Handles what happens when a backup / restore / sync task has completed
        Parameters:
        t - - Throwable object that may contain an excepting thrown during the task's execution
        taskType - - String describing the task
        status - - how did the task complete? 1 - success, 2 - cancelled, 3 - error.

      • comboDevicesChanged

        private javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.String> comboDevicesChanged()
        Updates the device info label to represent the status of the newly selected device Note: this can lead to a IndexOutOfBoundsException in the JavaFX threading, the exception won't crash the application but will lead to a error not being displayed. This is a known JDK8 bug that won't be fixed: https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8188899
        Returns:
        ChangeListener that stores functionality to update label when comboboxDevice's value changes

      • terminateApplication

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> terminateApplication()
        Exits application
        Returns:
        EventHandler for button click that will call system exit and close the application

      • generateMenu

        public javafx.scene.control.MenuBar generateMenu()
        Builds menu for different colour themes.
        Returns:
        MenuBar containing the 3 settings - regular, dark and colour-blind modes.

      • changeTheme

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> changeTheme(java.lang.String stylesheet)
        Allows for changing colour theme of application.
        Parameters:
        stylesheet - - style to apply for the theme change
        Returns:
        An EventHandler for the on-click action
